TopicTitle: is ksp better on windows 7 or 8

Articles.Content: is ksp better on windows 7 or 8

Everything is better on Windows 7 than 8.

But seriously, it shouldn't be much different at all, and as someone with a Developer Preview of Windows 10, your not going to want to do anything ... "drastic"... right now. It's shaping up to be what Windows 8 should have been.
As an OS "tweaker", I say better on 7... 7 isnt quite the memory hog that 8 is... On typical Windows installs, about 250-500MB more RAM usage for 8...
